```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)

volcano_df = data.frame(
  x = rep(10*(1:nrow(volcano)), each=ncol(volcano)),
  y = rep(10*(1:ncol(volcano)), times=nrow(volcano)),
  z = as.vector(t(volcano)))

plot_volcano = function(option){
  
  pal_name = switch(
    option,
    A = 'magma',
    B = 'inferno',
    C = 'plasma',
    D = 'viridis',
    E = 'cividis')
  
  ggplot(volcano_df, aes(x, y, fill=z)) +
    geom_tile() +
    scale_fill_viridis(
      option=option,
      name = '',
      guide=guide_colorbar(
        barwidth=grid::unit(0.06, units='npc'),
        barheight=grid::unit(0.6, units='npc'))) +
    coord_equal() +
    labs(title = paste('Option', option)) +
    theme(
      axis.line=element_blank(),
      axis.text=element_blank(),
      axis.title=element_blank(),
      axis.ticks=element_blank(),
      panel.background=element_blank())
}

```
